website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you need hangers specifically made for skirts and pants and like that they are both adjustable and flexible.
pros: Their simple yet flexible design makes them ideal for keeping pants and skirts wrinkle-free while simultaneously neatly organizing your closet
Clips are adjustable and keep garments from slipping
cons: Issues with a few broken hangers in the package upon arrival have been reported
Somewhat pricey, considering you only get 12 per pack

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think, just buy.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical on buying these hangers because they were so inexpensive. I’m so happy I went through with it. They are amazing. They hold up even my heaviest jeans. I will definitely be buying some more.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to hang pants in my son's closet after removing a cube storage and replacing it with a second bar. These were perfect for what I needed. The clips slide, so they fit his 2T/3T clothes, but I can also hang a few of my own things as well. Ordered two boxes of 50 and all hangers arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love how I can just take a quick glance at ...
customer_reviews.text: Kept my fabrics organized without worrying about creases. Love how I can just take a quick glance at the rack and find what I need. Obviously I need to get some more lol
customer_reviews.author: Betzski Silverdale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are absolutely fantastic! They hold even my heaviest of skirts (around 3lbs). They were very nicely packaged and organized. I will absolutely buy these again should I need more than 100.
customer_reviews.author: Becca W.

customer_reviews.title: Too popular with our renters.
customer_reviews.text: I love these...will hold heavy skirts or pants. I first bought these for our home and liked them so well, I bought more for our rental condos. The bad news is that they are disappearing from our condos....I guess other people like them, too.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Nice hangers
customer_reviews.text: The hangers came wrapped in slim plastic loosely in a box. Good thing they were all intact. I really liked the way they were clipped to each other so that I had no issue untangling them! I also have stored them that way to save closet space until I transfer my pants and shorts to them. The clips are strong, open wide and I had no problem squeezing them open (I have compromised hand strength). I would recommend giving these a try.
customer_reviews.author: QUIqui

customer_reviews.title: Durable Hangers
customer_reviews.text: Unlike so many skirt/pant hangers, these are durable with good quality clip for holding your clothing items. Too many hangers I have had can barely hold one skirt well. These are great holding 2 items without leaving clip marks on your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: brick house

customer_reviews.title: They are just as descripted!
customer_reviews.text: They came in the mail two days after I ordered them. They are all in perfect shape and are very strong and sturdy. They definitely do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Stiles Winchester

customer_reviews.title: Buy from This Fantastic Company -- These Hangers Arrived Fast and Are PERFECT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Exactly what I wanted and needed, and the way they were "clipped" together for packaging was so smart and easy. Even the shipping time was really, really fast. That reminds me... I need "regular" hangers -- I think I'll go to their website (hope they have one) and see what they've got in the way of simple hangers with hooks on the shoulder part. They deserve a lot of business.
customer_reviews.author: Susie V Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are great to keep slacks and jeans in order. They're easy to use and grip well. I don't like to fold slacks and jeans over hangers because it makes a crease. I always used clothes pins, but they aren't very durable. I'd get these again, but I won't need to for a long time because it was in a package of 12 hangers. Definitely worth the price. I ordered these hangers and posted this review several years ago. I just ordered 12 more. I love these hangers! They just arrived and I already have the rest of my jeans and slacks hung up with these hangers. Out with the clothespins and metal hangers!
customer_reviews.author: Judy B.

customer_reviews.title: House Day 12 pcs Pack 14" Clear Plastic Hangars for Skirts/Pants just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these skirt/pants hangars. I've bought several packs of these Hangers over the the past years, as we have moved a lot. They are so easy to use and it looks more uniform in the closet. They arrived on time and were packaged just great. No chance that they could break in my package. They are lightweight to use and easy to store.... very easy to hang things up. They've really help me a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Carole D.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, clip sliders are a bit tight.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of these hangers. They are sleek and simple. My only issue is the clip sliders are a bit snug, and don’t glide back and forth so easily. So had to give it 4 stars instead of 5. Hoping that they will loosen up over time. Other than that, I really like this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lee.

customer_reviews.title: Too light, too cheap, best to buy another brand
customer_reviews.text: Usually have great luck with items labeled Amazon's choice. These hangers do not fit the bill. These hangers are very light weight and smaller than the older style pants hangers. I expect that many of the hangers will snap when used if hanging something heavy like a pair of jeans. Cannot even see considering a suit on these hangers, and I do use some of the older style to hang suits, though most suits are on nice wooden hangers. All in all these hangers are really a maximum budget buy to try and get by until one can afford a good set of hangers. They do not deserve an Amazons Choice label. Not really suitable for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly- very nice quality hanger and very sturdy. I highly recommend:)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Bulk-pack Metal clip skirt hangers
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a 25 pack of standard metal clip skirt hangers. 25 of these is more than I need at the moment, but I'll have spares to replace broken ones, I guess. The metal clips are plenty grippy enough to hang even wet skirts right out of the washing machine in the event that you want to air-dry instead of putting your garment in a dryer.
customer_reviews.author: ctsurv553

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not for heavy skirts.
customer_reviews.text: These are good if you don't have any "heavy" skirts to hang up. I have a few pleated, heavier material/higher quality skirts that kept slipping from these and I would find them on the floor in my closet. Finally I just gave up on trying to hang them up again and bought different hangers specifically for those skirts.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Every single hanger has broken! They are extremely flimsy. Do not waste your money. I would rate this, a zero if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Horrid little flimsy hangers
customer_reviews.text: Horrible little hangers. The top end isn’t turned over, so it will catch on things. The plastic is very thin and not sturdy like the skirt hangers which Amazon no longer sells, which had a longer neck, thicker plastic, and a round hole (instead of the square one which these have). The others are so MUCH better made. I’m sorry to have to buy more hangers at another source, rather than Amazon. Big, big fail. These are horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Korr

customer_reviews.title: The good and bad- I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: What I do like: They're affordable They have the swivel top so they can be turned either way They have the cut outs to hang sleeveless or oversized clothes They have the hole so you can pair outfits / stagger hang I dislike: They aren't made the best They are kind of flimsy Not the most durable
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great for light clothes, but avoid if you're displaying heavier garments like jeans.
customer_reviews.text: They are durable, and do the job, but not great. For lighter garments like skirts and shorts, they're great, but for heavier items like jeans they leave a lot to be desired. The clips are too short. They will hold a pair of jeans, but when customers start rifling through the rack, a lot of the jeans fell off. If the clips were about half an inch longer, they'd be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dugan

customer_reviews.title: BEST DEAL FOR "CLIPPY" HANGERS FOR PANTS OR SKIRTS?
customer_reviews.text: I only hang my pants and skits on "clippers hangers" as my daughter named them years ago. Most stores will no longer give them to you with a purchase,as they resume them now. So, when I ran out of them I turned to Amazon, know they would have the best deal on them. They have them at Wal-Mart, but they were too much for a set of 5. I've now purchased my 2nd set. They are very sturdy, and I love that they have a swivel hook/hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Rice

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones in department stores!
customer_reviews.text: Hi - when I buy clothes from a department store, I ask if I can keep the hangers. Most times the cashier says "Yes", but I was running out. So this is a great purchase. Not only are the good for pants, but for drip drying towels, pillow cases, but you can add clamps and drip dry multiple items, like scarves or socks.
customer_reviews.author: GingerSnaps

customer_reviews.title: Basic pant hangers, great deal, fill the bill!
customer_reviews.text: Not fancy, but great quality for the price, and fill the bill for everyday hanging of pants. Quantity & price beats ”the big red target” store and you can’t beat the convenience of next day delivery! I launder a lot of everyday pants and need a good supply of basic hangers near the dryer. I will restock from this source when needed!
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with these hangers. I can hang anything with them, using the shoulder shapes on top or the clips on the bottom. At less than a dollar each, they are a terrific value and I'm very happy I got them. I have hung some large and heavy garments with no trouble because the clips are very strong and hold well. I would highly recommend these hangers.
customer_reviews.author: crewelgirl

customer_reviews.title: Appear to be sturdy enough for blue jeans
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact the hangers are 14" wide. The clips seem to be strong and the plastic inserts in the clips are a nice feature because they won't damage the waist bands on my wife's dress pants. I can't comment on the durability because I haven't owned the hangers long enough to give an accurate rating.
customer_reviews.author: My Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Don't seem to be super sturdy, but will work well.
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are perfect for what I want them for. They don't seem to be super sturdy, so I'll just have to be extra careful when using them. Great price, so very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ACHA

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I like my slacks hung up, but had trouble finding just the right kind of hangers to utilize a smaller capacity clothes closet. These work great. My slacks and skirts aren't really heavy or bulky, so these are great to use for several. I'm delighted with them.
customer_reviews.author: lks

customer_reviews.title: I've just purchased these skirt hangers.
customer_reviews.text: I have just purchased these skirt hangers. I cannot attest to their durability. But so far a good value for money. I like how you can store them all together by clipping them to each other. They take up little space in a closet or a rack in the laundry room and they are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: mary hagen

customer_reviews.title: Love these hangers!
customer_reviews.text: Spent the summer doing a closet revamp and i decided to hang all bottoms instead of keeping them folded. These hangers did the job. My clothes look organized and i can find the pants or skirts i want quickly. They feel a little flimsy while i was trying to separate them out of the box and i was afraid i would break them but they all held up. If you are considering these, get them. At this price point, they are a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with 1 broken
customer_reviews.text: Received these in a timely manner. One was broken before it was packed as it was only half of the hanger when opened. Not worth arguing over at this price. Time will tell how well they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Saje

customer_reviews.title: well made  - great to hang off the shoulder shirts
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what they are. Same ones I had growing up. In other words, well made. I was worried they might be cheaply made and "fragile." I needed more since my off the shoulder shirts always fell off my hangers. And I hang my laundry out to dry in warm weather, so I always need a lot of these. Better than clothes pins.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and no rough edges on the clips
customer_reviews.text: I got these hangers to replace the trouser hangers in my grandchildren's closets. The price was right (inexpensive) and the amount was adequate. When I received them, they were packaged so that they would not break in transit. They are sturdy hangers and the clips are not rough on the edges, a must for knits. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Nana

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE VERY BASIC
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed when I received these hangers. One of them arrived broken, not worth returning so it just got trashed. The other ones are just okay. Not strong, just have a cheap feel to them. I guess they will do the job okay -- just meh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go To Hanger - Repurchase
customer_reviews.text: Pros - adjustable width (versatile) - affordable price - easy to use, light - weaker clamps don't leave marks and help preserve clothing better - holds heavy pants/skirts Cons - wish clamps were even weaker Gonna keep repurchasing this until I find a weaker clamp like the ones in department stores. For the price, this quality is pretty unmatchable.
customer_reviews.author: isaac jeon

customer_reviews.title: great hangers
customer_reviews.text: i love these hangers. they work great for pants and skirts. i find that they take up less space than normal hangers that i fold my pants over. very light weight and feel like they might break but hold multiple pairs of jeans on each hanger. hooks are moveable and grip well.
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Do their job
customer_reviews.text: Bought these so I would be able to clear some drawer room by hanging up my pants. They are cheap like the thrift store hangers, the clips do not move easily at all and make a horrible noise (chalk board style) when you do move them. I just tried to quickly put my pants on them and not adjust it lol. If this doesn’t bother you, they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I needed to organize all of my kids pants and shorts. easier than folding and putting in drawers. I honestly thought I was going to be purchasing some cheap hangers for the price I paid but I was very surprised that they are actually great hangers and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Rucker

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and large enough to hold men's jeans
customer_reviews.text: Bought them to use for my husband's jeans. I hang them up to dry to prevent shrinking. These hangers were the perfect size (14 inch) for men's pants. Since they are metal, they wont easily break like the plastic hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Russell

customer_reviews.title: Not as thick as I thought
customer_reviews.text: They are not as thick as the ones I bought in the store. I really thought they would be more sturdy. If I bent one it would surely snap without any problems. I hope they are sturdy enough to accommodate my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: K. M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was looking for. They are wide enough to hold skirts and pants properly and the clips are quite strong, I’m only wondering how strong the lightweight plastic will be over time.
customer_reviews.author: Beaudette

customer_reviews.title: Basic Easy Pants Hangers
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing special about these. Thesy are your basic pants hangers. They seem sturdy enough, though nothing to write home about. This is a decent deal if you require this sort of hangar. ~ Kort
customer_reviews.author: Kort

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for skirts and pants
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly flimsy but not that sturdy. Have had these before and they break after alot of use. But are great while they last. The cost is cheap enough to continue buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 100 hangers for our spring cleaning. Easy to unpackage from the box, thick hangers..: none were damaged or broken and hangers are thick plastic and sturdy, great for skirts, maxi dresses, men’s and women’s dress slacks No more wire hangers!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Shook

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I finally have enough skirt hangers! We just moved into our new house and I thought I should help my closet grow up a little bit. These hangers came in perfect condition and have made my organization so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: kray

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, well-made
customer_reviews.text: Was so pleasantly surprised, these are exactly what I needed for even the heaviest of my husband’s cargo pants. Do not hesitate, they are really well-made.
customer_reviews.author: WestViewPark234

customer_reviews.title: Less than a month six broke!!!
customer_reviews.text: They don't last long at all, for no reason they all of a sudden will break.
customer_reviews.author: Millc.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best hangers in the world!! I have now replaced all my hangers with these for easy organizing for all of my pants. Def recommend !! You won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Important everyday product which is a “must have”.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy pants hangers! I think I still have some from 20 yrs ago! They make neat work of your closet arrangement and seem to last forever! I just keep losing them on trips!
customer_reviews.author: Angel of the Springs

customer_reviews.title: Just a tad flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Plastic seems a bit flimsy, but I am only hanging up skirts so they work and the value was good for the money. Now, if on the other hand I was hanging something a bit weightier like say, suits or something like that, then the structural integrity would be under interrogation.
customer_reviews.author: The Muse

customer_reviews.title: hangers with clips
customer_reviews.text: I needed to have hangers with clips so that I can hang up my toe protectors after washing them with soap and water. I really dont need a dozen but who knows? I think more ideas of what i need them for will pop in my head eventually in the future
customer_reviews.author: Sara Faucher

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: only wish they were a bit more sturdy. They can twist somewhat easily under force, but I have not broken any since owning for over 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Simon Templar

customer_reviews.title: Clips hard to slide
customer_reviews.text: I really like these hangers. The hook swivels and the clips are padded and strong. The clips are hard to slide when hangers are new. I put a very light coat of a white petroleum jelly, Vaseline, on the rods and it helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: George Williams

customer_reviews.title: In a Pinch
customer_reviews.text: These are my life saver. Dryer: broken. Clothesline: indoors. Hangers: take less space on said indoor clothesline. Me: thank you!
customer_reviews.author: WalkOn62

customer_reviews.title: Saved space and organized my closet
customer_reviews.text: I use these mostly for my jeans/pants. The clips adjust to hold on to smaller clothes or can become wider for larger items. All 25 hangers were intact and nicely packaged when they arrived. The plastic feels durable. Only con was that they were hard to take apart when I opened the package, but it was worth it after my closet was organized!
customer_reviews.author: amazonguy5187

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I use these for skirts and pants. Nice quality just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kzc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hangers, great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted great deal for the price, very sturdy I highly recommend this product they were packaged very nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Kenziekoo

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: In addition to being a good buy, these hangers come arranged in such a manner that I can store the unused ones by hanging and they only take up the space of one hanger. I have other hangers which I need to keep in a box while not in use.
customer_reviews.author: golfer

customer_reviews.title: These work well for my shorts
customer_reviews.text: I don't have enough drawer space in my dresser for my shorts but I have enough closet space. These hold my shorts well.
customer_reviews.author: Hartful

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed clips spin while trying to hang skirts on and take up too much space!
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with these hangers, the clips spin constantly while trying to hang skirts on. Not only that they take up far more space than the plastic ones making less space in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Trinkets35

customer_reviews.title: Fulfill the need but a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The hangers are functional but, for the money I paid, they are fairly flimsy. The clips are a little difficult to move. They are usable, though.
customer_reviews.author: mspiper

customer_reviews.title: Great Hangers for Pants/Skirts
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and extremely easy Hangers tp put pants and skirts in closet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Locantro

customer_reviews.title: Hanging around in my closet.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like to fold or crease my pants and jeans, skirts, etc. Using these hangers gives my closet a nice, uniform look. The hangers are sturdy and are able to hold whatever I want to hang, and the clips seem extra strong. If you want to organize your closet, these are a must have.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTY FOX

customer_reviews.title: Skirt Hangers with Clips
customer_reviews.text: When you can't find the product locally, you look online! Delivery was quick and product was exactly as listed!
customer_reviews.author: Marion M. Ringwood

customer_reviews.title: With this price it's a good deal. The hanger are lightweight
customer_reviews.text: With this price it's a good deal. The hanger are lightweight, both the hook and clips can be adjusted. My only complain is the way they are packaged it took me quite a while to unclip all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sunting

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, durable, quality and swivel top. What can I say? They do the job well and they are worth the $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Blue

customer_reviews.title: Quite Pleased and Absolutely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: To my surprise the hangers are sturdy, adjustable and very practical. The clips have Soft Cushion Rubbers so the teeth won't damage the pants / material / fabric. Absolutely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: SysAdmin

customer_reviews.title: The clips are a little smaller then I anticipated but they're sturdy! I can easily hang my jeans and skirts
customer_reviews.text: Fairly decent hangers! The clips are a little smaller then I anticipated but they're sturdy! I can easily hang my jeans and skirts! It's a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Dezirae Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I'll be buying more
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Non were broken. Perfect for hanging the silk flags in I'm sewing. The grip is strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase
customer_reviews.text: The hangers are just what I hoped for: STURDY!! They hold heavy jeans and cords beautifully. Perfect purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Laverne

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap
customer_reviews.text: Better off keeping the hangars that come with pants that stores complimentary provide.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne B from Lawrenceville

customer_reviews.title: These are not even worth it. They are very ...
customer_reviews.text: These are not even worth it. They are very cheap plastic. I wish my old ones I used to buy were still available. Bummer! Wont' work for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Etzkorn Family

customer_reviews.title: Only for light garments
customer_reviews.text: The metal hook that the plastic hangs from slides through the plastic hole holding the hanger together if you hang these off of Escher- which is how I wanted to use them- they work ok for hanging one skirt on won’t hold heavier items like a pair of jeans would make it slip through
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: For my business
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 12 Pcs Pack 14 inch Clear Plastic Skirt Hangers with Clips, Skirt Hangers, Clip Hangers basically for my skirts for my business when I go out to vendor. They are very durable and I like the idea that you can hang them anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH LASSITER

customer_reviews.title: Fit the purpose I needed them for.
customer_reviews.text: Great solid hanger! I have a lot of shorts and needed a way to hang them in the closet. This hanger fit my purpose. No more wrinkles from folding. Would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Markell Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Lighter than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I found that the pant hangers are quite flimsy, although after using them for a short while, they have held up. We received a well packaged set of hangers on the promised date. Only time will tell if these light weight pant hangers hold up with use!
customer_reviews.author: C. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: A great, easy to use hanger for holding up to two skirts, slacks, jeans or shorts. Seems to be sturdy, but, I will have to see how they hold up to long term use. The package arrived with everyone of the 24 hangers in perfect condition and all the holding clips in working order. Helping to organize my closets!
customer_reviews.author: Javajo

customer_reviews.title: Great for hanging pants & shorts
customer_reviews.text: These are my preferred way to hang pants and shorts. The plastic quality is not as good as those created in the past but what is? They work the way I expect them to but may not last as long. This type is hard to find locally so I'm thankful there's a resource available.
customer_reviews.author: eusrIMHO

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is suppose to very well
customer_reviews.text: The hook swivles, the clips can be adjusted in or out to fit any thing you might what to hang. Also the clips grip tight. Very pleased with the purchase dont buy the more expensive hangers when you get a great product here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon65788

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about these. They're sturdy and obviously very reliable. I wanted bamboo hangers for the "look" and appeal but the prices were ridiculous. Considering that these are just going to chill in my closet anyway, they're definitely all I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: Received at least one hanger broken, and another falling apart but able to use. Not much that you couldn't get better quality in store.
customer_reviews.author: catq

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I hate how they clipped them all together it was a pain to undo them lol but they’re nice for hanging pants/skirts!
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: They're just pant hangers, so they're really not that complicated nor interesting. Still, they're of good quality and hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Akbari

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We don't like those plastic hangers, and these are hard to come by, but so glad we found them here and are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: You Can Never Have too Many
customer_reviews.text: I somehow never have enough pant/skirt hangers, these were nice and sturdy and the best price I could find. I can also yank my skirts off (yes I’m lazy) and I don’t need to worry about them snapping.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and Broken
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are made of a very thin plastic. Two hangers were broken upon shipment. I just kept it to avoid a return, but I don’t believe they will last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I finally converted my skirt pile into a section in my closet where they can hang. I’ve tried the velvet clip ons for the velvet hangers, but they just weren’t strong enough. These came connected together in fours and are just as described. I’m glad I finally invested in these.
customer_reviews.author: Gracia Family

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers have been perfect in re-organizing my all season closet. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Deb

customer_reviews.title: ... hangers and clothes pins and replaced them with these wonderful hangqers. My closet looks so nice
customer_reviews.text: I got rid of all my old wire hangers and clothes pins and replaced them with these wonderful hangqers. My closet looks so nice.!

customer_reviews.text: These hangers are sturdy and not cheap floppy plastic. They are very much like the ones you would find in a clothing store. Just started using them but no complaints so far. I’ll be buying more if needed!

customer_reviews.title: pieces seperate when hanging
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 32 and this was for several pairs of dockers khakis I needed hangers for. The handle seperates completely from the actual plastic hanger portion when you try to hang your clothes. Never have I seen this. The pants are light weight. Handle portion just pops right out and pants fall to floor. Glad this was only 12.99 but money I completely lost.
customer_reviews.author: TSpod

customer_reviews.title: Strong clips holds strong
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are light weight but have very strong clips. I am using them to store quilting fabric and i can easily clip in 5+ yards of fabric folded up. This equates to up to 3/4" of bulk the clip can hold easily.
customer_reviews.author: JillyVanilly

product_meta.title: HOUSE DAY 12 Pcs Pack 14 inch Clear Plastic Skirt Hangers with Clips, Skirt Hangers, Clip Hangers for Pants, Bulk Plastic Hangers
feature_bullets: STURDY QUALITY - Made from durable heavy-duty clear plastic, our clip hangers for skirts measure 14" in length and 5" from the top of the hook to the bottom bar. These clear plastic pants hangers with clips from House Day are an essential purchase for your home or clothing business!

ORGANIZE YOUR CLOSET - They are inexpensive but work just as well as more expensive hangers. Our slack hangers make your closet much more manageable -- nice to have uniformity.Your can stack the uniform dress on the hangers and clip a short or pant on each a clip. This has been a huge space saver in your closet which never looked more organized.

CONVENIENCE DESIGN - The bottom hangers with polish chrome swivel hook are pretty convenience that hangers can be hung from either direction. Load bearing up to 7.7lbs, the clips are easy to open, yet they strong enough to hold the shorts and skirts effectively, which don't slip out of the grippers. No more pants on the floor of the closet.

ADJUSTABLE CLIPS - If your skirts are hard to stay on regular non-clipped hangers, you could try our clip hangers. Each one has two tight clasps that move to the width of the skirt or slacks, from oversized maxi to children's clothing.

TAKE CARE OF YOUR CLOTHES - If you don't like folding your nice slacks and skirts or packing them in your luggage if you travel a lot, our HOUSE DAY skirt hangers would help you. They could hang all your pants or skirts, so there's no worrying about getting them wrinkled in the drawers, keeping the creases and trousers stay wrinkle free and easy to find.
